name: Jump Up Champion!
description:
Jump Up Champion! is an exciting and challenging game that puts your jumping skills to the test.

In this game, you play as a character who can only move by jumping. However, there's a catch - your blood level is constantly decreasing, and the only way to replenish it is by destroying enemies that are scattered throughout the game world. Your mission is to travel as far as possible without falling into the traps that are installed ahead of time on your path. You'll encounter all sorts of obstacles and enemies, each with their own unique abilities and attack patterns.

It's up to you to think carefully about every move you make in order to survive and advance to the next level.
So strap on your jumping shoes and get ready to prove that you're the ultimate champion in this thrilling game!

Game features :
- Different skins for character
- Shop with special superpowers
- Unlimited road
